Package com.ontotext.graphdb.replaytool.goreplay

Class GraphDBPackage

java.lang.Object
com.ontotext.graphdb.replaytool.goreplay.GoReplayPackage
com.ontotext.graphdb.replaytool.goreplay.RDF4JPackage
com.ontotext.graphdb.replaytool.goreplay.GraphDBPackage
public class GraphDBPackage extends RDF4JPackage
Handles GraphDB specifics. User authentication and gen generate GDB authentication tokens
Version:
1.0
Author:
Copyright © 2024 Ontotext AD

    • GraphDBPackage

      public GraphDBPackage(Scanner stream) throws NoSuchElementException, InterruptedException
      Reads a package and parses it for authentication
      Parameters:
      stream - Scanner to read the next line from
      Throws:
      NoSuchElementException - when nothing is available to read
      InterruptedException - if process receives a signal while reading
      See Also:
      • GoReplayPackage(Scanner)

  • Method Details

    • usesAuthorization

      public Boolean usesAuthorization()
      Returns True if GraphDB or Basic authentication token is present in the package
      Returns:
      True if authentication token is present

    • getAuthorizationToken

      public String getAuthorizationToken()
      The authorization token without the authorization schema
      Returns:
      Authorization token

    • getAuthorizationType

      public String getAuthorizationType()
      Authorization type, one of:
      • AUTHORIZATION_TYPE_NONE
      • AUTHORIZATION_TYPE_GDB
      • AUTHORIZATION_TYPE_BASIC

      Digest is currently not supported

      Returns:
      Authorization type

    • getAuthorizationUser

      public String getAuthorizationUser()
      The authorization username
      Returns:
      Username

    • setAuthorizationSecret

      public static void setAuthorizationSecret(String hmacSecret) throws NoSuchAlgorithmException, InvalidKeyException
      Set the secret used to generate new authentication tokens

      This method must be called before calls before calls to replaceAuthorizationToken, or an InvalidKeyException will be thrown.

      Parameters:
      hmacSecret - Secret must be the same as the secret set on the server being replayed to
      Throws:
      NoSuchAlgorithmException - Unlikely to be thrown
      InvalidKeyException - Unlikely to be thrown

    • replaceAuthorizationToken

      public void replaceAuthorizationToken() throws InvalidKeyException
      Replace authorization token with a newly generated token for the same user
      Throws:
      InvalidKeyException - Thrown if the HMAC is not initialized
      See Also:
      • setAuthorizationSecret(String)
